briefTitle: Estrogen Receptor (ER) PET/CT Imaging in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Estrogen Receptor (ER) PET/CT Imaging in Breast Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, TNBC - Triple-Negative Breast Cancer, Estrogen-receptor-negative Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* More than 18 years old
* Patients with pathologically confirmed breast cancer
* Sign the informed consent form

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant women
* Severe underlying diseases that cannot cooperate with PET examination
